column17:
Make a deviant style statement with this pair of shoes from Enroute. The all black uppers have perforations towards the toe with floral stitch work adorning it. The laced closure together with the strong midsole keeps your feet in place. The outsole is made from durable material and offers you ample stability on the go.

Style Tip
Pair up with denims and casual/formal shirt to create different style as per your choice.

Specifications
Colour: Black
Usage: Casual
Style: Laced

Care Tips
Gently brush away dust or dirt using a soft cleaning brush.
You can also use a dry soft sponge or hand towel to restore surface.
